midas/examples/experiment/adccalib.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /********************************************************************\
00002 
00003   Name:         adccalib.c
00004   Created by:   Stefan Ritt
00005 
00006   Contents:     Example analyzer module for ADC calibration. Looks
00007                 for ADC0 bank, subtracts pedestals and applies gain
00008                 calibration. The resulting values are appended to 
00009                 the event as an CADC bank ("calibrated ADC"). The
00010                 pedestal values and software gains are stored in
00011                 adccalib_param structure which was defined in the ODB
00012                 and transferred to experim.h.
00013 
00014   $Log: adccalib.c,v $
00015   Revision 1.1.1.1  2005/06/20 23:37:11  mucap
00016   Importing release 1.9.5 of the MIDAS source code as distributed by PSI.
00017   (Next, I'll commit our local customizations.)
00018

00058 #include "midas.h"
00059 #include "experim.h"
00060 #include "analyzer.h"
00061 
00062 /* root includes */
00063 #include <TH1F.h>
00064 #include <TTree.h>

00066 /*-- Parameters ----------------------------------------------------*/
00067 
00068 ADC_CALIBRATION_PARAM adccalib_param;
00069 extern EXP_PARAM exp_param;
00070 extern RUNINFO runinfo;
00071 
00072 /*-- Module declaration --------------------------------------------*/
00073 
00074 INT adc_calib(EVENT_HEADER *, void *);
00075 INT adc_calib_init(void);
00076 INT adc_calib_bor(INT run_number);
00077 INT adc_calib_eor(INT run_number);
00078 
00079 ADC_CALIBRATION_PARAM_STR(adc_calibration_param_str);
00080 
00081 ANA_MODULE adc_calib_module = {
00082    "ADC calibration",           /* module name           */
00083    "Stefan Ritt",               /* author                */
00084    adc_calib,                   /* event routine         */
00085    adc_calib_bor,               /* BOR routine           */
00086    adc_calib_eor,               /* EOR routine           */
00087    adc_calib_init,              /* init routine          */
00088    NULL,                        /* exit routine          */
00089    &adccalib_param,             /* parameter structure   */
00090    sizeof(adccalib_param),      /* structure size        */
00091    adc_calibration_param_str,   /* initial parameters    */
00092 };
00093 
00094 /*-- module-local variables ----------------------------------------*/
00095 
00096 static TH1F *hAdcHists[N_ADC];
00097 
00098 /*-- init routine --------------------------------------------------*/
00099 
00100 #define ADC_N_BINS   500
00101 #define ADC_X_LOW      0
00102 #define ADC_X_HIGH  4000
00103 
00104 INT adc_calib_init(void)
00105 {
00106    char name[256];
00107    int i;
00108 
00109    /* book CADC histos */
00110 
00111    for (i = 0; i < N_ADC; i++) {
00112       char title[256];
00113 
00114       sprintf(name, "CADC%02d", i);
00115       sprintf(title, "ADC %d", i);
00116 
00117       hAdcHists[i] = H1_BOOK(name, title, ADC_N_BINS, ADC_X_LOW, ADC_X_HIGH);
00118    }
00119 
00120    return SUCCESS;
00121 }
00122 
00123 /*-- BOR routine ---------------------------------------------------*/
00124 
00125 INT adc_calib_bor(INT run_number)
00126 {
00127    return SUCCESS;
00128 }
00129 
00130 /*-- eor routine ---------------------------------------------------*/
00131 
00132 INT adc_calib_eor(INT run_number)
00133 {
00134    return SUCCESS;
00135 }
00136 
00137 /*-- event routine -------------------------------------------------*/
00138 
00139 INT adc_calib(EVENT_HEADER * pheader, void *pevent)
00140 {
00141    INT i;
00142    WORD *pdata;
00143    float *cadc;
00144 
00145    /* look for ADC0 bank, return if not present */
00146    if (!bk_locate(pevent, "ADC0", &pdata))
00147       return 1;
00148 
00149    /* create calibrated ADC bank */
00150    bk_create(pevent, "CADC", TID_FLOAT, &cadc);
00151 
00152    /* zero cadc bank */
00153    for (i = 0; i < N_ADC; i++)
00154       cadc[i] = 0.f;
00155 
00156    /* subtract pedestal */
00157    for (i = 0; i < N_ADC; i++)
00158       cadc[i] = (float) ((double) pdata[i] - adccalib_param.pedestal[i] + 0.5);
00159 
00160    /* apply software gain calibration */
00161    for (i = 0; i < N_ADC; i++)
00162       cadc[i] *= adccalib_param.software_gain[i];
00163 
00164    /* fill ADC histos if above threshold */
00165    for (i = 0; i < N_ADC; i++)
00166       if (cadc[i] > (float) adccalib_param.histo_threshold)
00167          hAdcHists[i]->Fill(cadc[i], 1);
00168 
00169    /* close calculated bank */
00170    bk_close(pevent, cadc + N_ADC);
00171 
00172    return SUCCESS;
00173 }
